content: I know Cargo has the build-std feature now. But this is for building std as a dependency of a crate
what are methods to build std on its own?
I'm trying to achieve the same end as build-std, but my project does not (and cannot) use cargo
if someone could point me to the implementation of build-std in cargo that would be a great reference
I guess I should also ask on t-cargo
Run cargo -v -Zbuild-std in your crate and it'll print the rustc commands it invokes.
